title: Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Amanda Pull on Capri Regular
description: STYLE - Comfort waist capri sits at natural waist with five functional pockets, mock details and stretch for perfect fit Everytime
Versatility - Goes great with all tops and footwear with comfortable movement and maximum recovery ideal for work, class or vacation.
LENGTH - This high rise waist capri has a 21 inch inseam with a 16 inch leg opening
Effortlessly fun and stylish Gloria Vanderbilt is a versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.

Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Aparel; Amanda pull on comfort waist capri sits at the natural waistline with five functional pockets and stretch fabric for a perfect fit feeling Everytime. This high rise waist crop has a contour fit and stretch body with excellent recovery. Pairs perfectly with all tops from fashion forward to novelty tee shirt as well as all footwear from stylish heels to your favorit trendy flats. Available in assorted solid colors, see color name for specifics. - Gloria Vanderbilt is a versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.
